page.title: 04STRANGE STORIES
page.content: {The Swinging Gate} At the top of the backroads where the county depot is today there was an old wooden gate.This was a private gate that was suppossed to be kept closed but it would mysteriously swing open. Some men watched the gate and at 10.30 pm a strange old lady dressed in black opened the gate and went off towards the school.Nobody knew why she did this and she could not be followed. {The Mermaid One summer's day a man was sailing past the island of Eilean Hoan and he saw a beautiful lady sitting by the water.He went a wee bit closer and, as she dived into the water, he realised she was a mermaid. {The Devil One day the Devil was seen at Smoo Cave. He had cloven hooves,two horns and a horse's tail
